# One Tool to Replace Them All

> 30+ security tools in a single binary. Zero dependencies. 100% Rust.

- **Network** - Port scanning, host discovery, traceroute
- **Recon** - DNS, WHOIS, subdomain enumeration, OSINT
- **Web** - HTTP testing, CMS scanning, TLS audit
- **Cloud** - Subdomain takeover detection
- **Exploit** - Reverse shells, privesc, lateral movement

[Get Started](#/)
[GitHub](https://github.com/forattini-dev/redblue)
